entry.title: Bert Classification For Research Papers
entry.content:
Our goal is to build a model that uses the abstract and title of a paper to predict whether it will be rejected or not.

This is an article with code to refine BERT to perform text classification on a dataset of accepted and rejected scientific papers.
entry.summary: Our goal is to build a model that uses the abstract and title of a paper to predict whether it will be rejected or not.This is an article with code to refine BERT to perform text classification on a dataset of accepted and rejected scientific papers.
